# BrickDatabase

A library for enabling [EBean](https://ebean.io) ORM support to Minestom in a wiffy.

## Setup
```
repositories {
    maven { url 'https://jitpack.io' }
}

dependencies {
    implementation 'com.github.MinestomBrick:BrickDatabase:-SNAPSHOT'
}
```
